message.content: {"given_definition_quality":45,"better_definition":"teacher; instructor","sentence":"老师在学校。","image_prompt":"In a soft apocalypse animation style, depict a gentle, wise-looking teacher standing at the front of a simple classroom, pointing at a blackboard, with several children at desks. The classroom should look slightly worn and post-apocalyptic, with vines or faded paint on the walls, but the scene feels hopeful. Soft lighting and animated, expressive faces emphasize a sense of calm and learning.","sentence_translation":"The teacher is at school."}
